text: “Pambuyo (pa akazi awa amene uli nawo) nkosaloledwa kwa iwe kukwatira akazi ena, (poonjezera pa chiwerengero cha akazi amene uli nawo). Ndiponso usasinthe (ofanana ndi chiwerengero chawo), (zonsezi nzoletsedwa kwa iwe) ngakhale kuti ubwino wawo utakusangalatsa, kupatula chimene dzanja lako lakumanja lapeza; ndipo Allah ndi M’yang’aniri wa chinthu chilichonse
